mainBoard.flavorText: "The empire, long united, must divide, and long divided, must unite."

foreignData.name: 独立部隊
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

mainBoard.name: Independent Troops

mainBoard.flavorText: Through his allies, Meng Huo commanded several hundred thousand troops composed of cavalry, rattan-armored warriors, infantry, naked men with swords, and wild animals.

foreignData.name: 孟獲の大軍
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

mainBoard.name: Meng Huo's Horde

mainBoard.flavorText: Penniless and far from home, many former Yellow Scarves and other soldiers became bandits to survive.

foreignData.name: 山賊
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士・ならず者

mainBoard.name: Mountain Bandit
mainBoard.originalText: Mountain Bandit is unaffected by summoning sickness.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Across the land rebellions seethed and swarmed / As vicious war lords swooped down on all sides."

foreignData.name: 反逆の軍勢
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

mainBoard.name: Renegade Troops
mainBoard.originalText: Renegade Troops is unaffected by summoning sickness.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Swallowing his eye, the valiant Xiahou Dun fought on; / But Cao Cao's vanguard, its commander wounded, could not hold out for long."

foreignData.name: 戦場への復帰
foreignData.text: あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignData.type: ソーサリー

mainBoard.name: Return to Battle
mainBoard.originalText: Return any one creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mainBoard.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: To taunt a man into action, call him a coward. To insult him beyond forgiveness, call him a jackal.

foreignData.name: 訓練された野犬
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猟犬

mainBoard.name: Trained Jackal

mainBoard.flavorText: Cao Cao was more concerned with capabilities than lineage. He excelled at recruiting and retaining men of talent to serve him.

foreignData.name: 魏の近衛部隊
foreignData.text: 馬術（このクリーチャーは、馬術を持たないクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。）

mainBoard.name: Wei Elite Companions

rulings.text: Despite the similarities between horsemanship and flying, horsemanship doesn’t interact with flying or reach.

mainBoard.text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Wei won the battle of Hefei when Zhang Liao defeated Sun Quan and then foiled a Wu scheme to incite rebellion.

foreignData.name: 魏の歩兵部隊

mainBoard.name: Wei Infantry

mainBoard.flavorText:
He will win who, prepared himself, waits to take the enemy unprepared."
—Sun Tzu, *Art of War* (trans. Giles)

rulings.text: Despite the similarities between horsemanship and flying, horsemanship doesn’t interact with flying or reach.

mainBoard.text: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

mainBoard.flavorText: At the battle of Chang'an, Ma Chao defeated the two generals Cao Cao sent to guard the pass but was forced to flee when Cao Cao's trickery turned his own ally against him.

foreignData.name: 魏の打撃部隊

mainBoard.flavorText: Over 500,000 commoners followed Zhang Jue, General of Heaven, in his attempt to overthrow the corrupt Han dynasty.

foreignData.name: 黄巾賊
foreignData.text: 黄巾賊ではブロックできない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

mainBoard.name: Yellow Scarves Troops

mainBoard.flavorText: ". . . Jiang Wei alone still strove with might and main: / Nine times more he fought the north—in vain. . . ."

foreignData.name: 黄道の犬
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猟犬

mainBoard.name: Zodiac Dog
mainBoard.originalText: Mountainwalk (If defending player has a mountain in play, Zodiac Dog can't be blocked.)
mainBoard.text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

mainBoard.flavorText: ". . . By six offensives from the hills of Qi Kongming sought to change Han's destiny. . . ."

foreignData.name: 黄道の猿
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 類人猿

mainBoard.name: Zodiac Monkey
mainBoard.originalText: Forestwalk (If defending player has a forest in play, Zodaic Monkey can't be blocked.)
mainBoard.text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Though he held the title of prime minister, Cao Cao used the emperor's name to exert his own influence on the empire.

foreignData.name: 強要
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中からカードを１枚選ぶ。そのプレイヤーは、そのカードを捨てる。
foreignData.type: ソーサリー

mainBoard.name: Coercion
mainBoard.originalText: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Your opponent discards that card.
mainBoard.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

mainBoard.flavorText: Believing they wrote the forged letter that had been stolen from Zhou Yu, Cao Cao rashly executed his two best admirals for treason.

foreignData.name: 詭計
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚捨てる。
foreignData.type: ソーサリー

mainBoard.name: Deception
mainBoard.originalText: Your opponent chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand. (If your opponent has only one card, he or she discards it.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "With fire he broke the battle at Bowang . . . . Striking fear deep into Cao Cao's soul, thus Kongming scored a coup at his debut."

foreignData.name: 火攻め
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。火攻めはそれに３点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: ソーサリー

mainBoard.name: Fire Ambush
mainBoard.originalText: Fire Ambush deals 3 damage to any one creature or player.
mainBoard.text: Fire Ambush deals 3 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: Cao Cao was haunted to death by the ghosts of the empresses and other high courtiers he had murdered.

foreignData.name: 亡霊の出現
foreignData.text: 黒でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignData.type: ソーサリー

mainBoard.name: Ghostly Visit
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy any one creature that isn't black.
